com.github.pascualex.maze

Class Maze

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.pascualex.maze.Maze

  • public class Maze
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines the state of the maze, as well as the methods to build it and solve it.
    Author:
    Alejandro Pascual

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Maze()
      Instantiates a maze, with the maze finished flag and the solution finished flag set to false, since they are the ones that may be checked before initializing the maze.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean getBuildingExit()
      Returns the building exit flag.
      boolean getExitBuilt()
      Returns the exit built flag.
      boolean getMazeFinished()
      Returns the maze finished flag.
      boolean getSolutionExitBuilt()
      Returns the solution exit built flag.
      boolean getSolutionFinished()
      Returns the solution finished flag.
      Tile[][] getTiles()
      Returns the tiles of the maze.
      void restart(int columns, int rows)
      Initialises the tiles and all the flags of the maze to their initial state, resetting the state of the maze.
      void step()
      Based on the current state of the flags of the maze, advances one step in the building or solving process.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Maze

        public Maze()
        Instantiates a maze, with the maze finished flag and the solution finished flag set to false, since they are the ones that may be checked before initializing the maze.

    • Method Detail

      • restart

        public void restart(int columns,
                    int rows)
        Initialises the tiles and all the flags of the maze to their initial state, resetting the state of the maze.
        Parameters:
        columns - The new number of columns in the maze.
        rows - The new number of rows in the maze.

      • step

        public void step()
        Based on the current state of the flags of the maze, advances one step in the building or solving process. Won't do anything if the maze and the solution are already finished.

      • getTiles

        public Tile[][] getTiles()
        Returns the tiles of the maze.
        Returns:
        The tiles of the maze.

        public boolean getMazeFinished()
        Returns the maze finished flag.

        The maze finished flag.

      • getSolutionFinished

        public boolean getSolutionFinished()
        Returns the solution finished flag.
        Returns:
        The solution finished flag.

        public boolean getExitBuilt()
        Returns the exit built flag.
        Returns:
        The exit built flag.

      • getBuildingExit

        public boolean getBuildingExit()
        Returns the building exit flag.
        Returns:
        The building exit flag.

        Returns the solution exit built flag.
